quotes.text: I have come to love myself for who I am, for who I was, and for who I hope to become

quotes.text: No matter who you are, where you‚Äôre from, your skin colour, your gender identity; just speak yourself. Find your name and find your voice by speaking yourself

quotes.text: Do you know what purple means? Purple is last color of the rainbow, it means I will trust you and love you for a long time.

quotes.text: Love yourself. Love myself. Peace

quotes.text: Too many stars, too many dreams. The reality is that in front of these things, I‚Äôm just a speck of dust

quotes.text: It‚Äôs hard at times, but it‚Äôs as if I‚Äôm addicted to basking in your love. When I awake, I want to hurry on stage just for you

quotes.text: Happiness is not something you have to achieve, you can still feel happy during the process of achieving something

quotes.text: May your trials end in full bloom

quotes.text: You are the leader of your own life

quotes.text: I look forward to the day you will stand and tell your story

quotes.text: Just because someone else is having a hard time, does not mean your ‚Äúhard time‚Äù is not as difficult. So it is okay to say that you are having a hard time and ask a comfort from people around you.

quotes.text: No one knows tomorrow, but today we are the dream we followed yesterday

quotes.text: In Korean, the word ‚Äòfuture‚Äô is made up of two parts. The first part means ‚Äònot‚Äô and the second means ‚Äòto come.‚Äô In that sense, ‚Äòfuture‚Äô means something that will not come. This is to say: The future is now, and our now is us living our future
quotes.author: RM
quotes.info: Billboard Interview `BTS Speaks Out In Seoul` released on Feb 15, 2018

quotes.text: Someday, if our existence, or our music, our stage, our photos or videos, if all of that can help you even just a little... If your pain is 100 in a scale of 100, if we can lessen that to 99, 98 or 97, if we can only make it like that... the value of our existence is enough
quotes.author: RM
quotes.info: Ending Speech Ment @ 2017 WINGS TOUR THE FINAL in Seoul

quotes.text: Emotions are so different in every situation and every moment, so I think to agonize every moment is what life is

quotes.text: I live because I can't die

quotes.text: Silence is golden, don't waste time

quotes.text: Effort makes you. You will regret someday if you do not do your best now. Do not think it is too late but keep working on it. It may take time, but there is nothing that gets worse due to practising. So practice. You may get depressed, but its evidence that you are doing good
quotes.author: Jungkook
